excerpt: Puerto Iguazú is a city in northeast Argentina. It’s a gateway to Iguazú Falls in Iguazú National Park, with hundreds of cascades. The towering Garganta del Diablo fall sits in lush, wildlife-rich rainforest. Northwest, the Three Borders Landmark overlooks the rivers where Brazil, Paraguay and Argentina meet. Tancredo Neves Bridge crosses the River Iguazú to Brazil. Iguazú Biocenter has a butterfly farm and orchids.
detail_description: Puerto Iguazú, located in northeast Argentina, serves as the gateway to the breathtaking Iguazú Falls within the Iguazú National Park. The area is abundant with lush rainforests and diverse wildlife, including the impressive Garganta del Diablo waterfall. Additionally, visitors can explore the Three Borders Landmark offering stunning views of where Brazil, Paraguay, and Argentina meet.
name: Puerto Iguazú
address: Misiones Province, Argentina

excerpt: Park with an ecological theme featuring a jumbo model trap built with endangered trees, plus a cafe.
detail_description: La Aripuca is a unique ecological theme park located in Puerto Iguazu, Argentina. It serves as an educational attraction that raises awareness about deforestation. The park features a large model trap constructed from endangered trees and offers guided tours with informative facts about the impact of deforestation. Visitors can explore a house made from massive tree trunks and learn about the culture and history of the indigenous people through exhibitions and crafts.
name: La Aripuca
address: 9CJR+HJ, RN12 2, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Jungle wildlife refuge featuring guided tours & views of monkeys, toucans, ocelots & other animals.
detail_description: Güirá Oga is a wildlife sanctuary and rehabilitation center located just outside Puerto Iguazu, Argentina. The 19-hectare refuge is dedicated to rescuing and rehabilitating native fauna such as monkeys, toucans, ocelots, and other animals. Visitors can support conservation efforts by taking guided tours to learn about the significance of wildlife protection and rehabilitation.
name: Güirá Oga
address: RN12 1638, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Charming garden where visitors can observe hummingbirds sipping nectar from colorful bird feeders.
detail_description: Jardin de los Picaflores is a charming garden located in Puerto Iguazu, Argentina. It started as a family project in the backyard of their home and has become a popular spot for visitors to observe numerous hummingbirds sipping nectar from colorful bird feeders. The tranquil garden is filled with over 300 species of plants and offers a delightful experience for nature enthusiasts.
name: Jardin de los Picaflores
address: Fray Luis Beltrán 150, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: River views feature at this landmark park, fountain & obelisk dividing Argentina, Brazil & Paraguay.
detail_description: Hito Tres Fronteras, also known as the Three Borders Landmark, is a significant park located at the meeting point of Argentina, Brazil, and Paraguay. This landmark features an obelisk painted in the colors of the Paraguayan flag and offers stunning views of the Iguazu and Parana rivers. Recently renovated, it now includes a lookout point and green spaces for visitors to admire the beauty of the trinational region.
name: Hito Tres Fronteras (Argentina)
address: Av. Río Iguazú, Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: The Feirinha Puerto Iguazú is a must-visit spot in Argentina, drawing both tourists and locals. This simple market offers a range of typical Argentine products like alfajores, sweets, and cheese. It's a lively place where you can enjoy a casual dining experience with friends or family, savoring empanadas and snacks while having some beer.
name: Feirinha Puerto Iguazú
address: Av. Brasil 530, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: El Quincho del Tio Querido is a renowned Argentinian restaurant with over 30 years of experience in Puerto Iguazu. Known for its innovative approach and adaptation to diverse needs, it stands out as one of the best Grill Restaurants in Argentina. The restaurant offers a delectable selection of Argentine beef cuts paired with aged wines, providing an exceptional gastronomic experience.
name: El Quincho del Tio Querido
address: Av. Pres. Juan Domingo Perón 159, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Triple-frontier landmark with an obelisk, Jesuit museum, restaurant, fountain & playground.
detail_description: Marco das Três Fronteiras in Brazil is a significant landmark that marks the meeting point of the borders of Brazil, Argentina, and Paraguay. Situated near the convergence of the Iguacu and Parana rivers, it offers breathtaking panoramic views and a rich cultural experience. Visitors can explore an obelisk, Jesuit museum, restaurant, fountain, and playground on-site.
name: Marco das Três Fronteiras
address: Ac. Três Fronteiras - Foz do Iguaçu, PR, Brazil

detail_description: The Argentine Experience in Puerto Iguazu offers a unique gastronomic experience where visitors can participate in preparing traditional Argentine dishes like empanadas and alfajores. The menu also features succulent meats and renowned Argentine wines. With its fun and interactive presentation, guests are taken on a journey through Argentine cuisine, from the famous empanadas to the delicious alfajor with dulce de leche. This restaurant provides an opportunity to learn about local food while enjoying a memorable dining experience in a friendly atmosphere.
name: The Argentine Experience
address: Av. Brasil 57, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Modern store offering clothes, makeup, perfume, chocolate, beverages & more from global brands.
detail_description: Duty Free Shop Puerto Iguazu is a spacious and well-organized modern store located in the Argentinian Customs area near Foz do Iguacu. It offers a wide range of products from global brands, including clothing, makeup, perfume, chocolate, beverages, electronics, glasses, watches and more. Visitors can enjoy tax-free shopping with better prices compared to Brazil due to the absence of import taxes in Argentina.
name: Duty Free Shop Puerto Iguazu
address: RN 12, KM 1645, CP 3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Casino Iguazú is a trendy entertainment spot situated close to the breathtaking Iguazu Falls in Argentina. This contemporary casino boasts an array of gaming choices, such as slot machines, roulette, blackjack, and baccarat. Additionally, visitors can enjoy electronic games and access a VIP lounge designed for high-stakes players.
name: Casino Iguazú
address: RN12 12, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: La Casa de Botellas is a remarkable attraction that showcases creativity and innovation. The entire house, including the furniture and decor, is constructed from upcycled plastic bottles and other recycled materials. More than just a visual spectacle, this eco-friendly project aims to inspire visitors to consider their role in preserving nature. Additionally, the initiative serves as a means to uplift people from poverty by teaching them valuable skills for building houses using everyday materials.
name: La Casa de Botellas
address: Av. los Inmigrantes Lote 7 Mz B, 3370 Iguazu, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Flashy gambling destination with many table games & slots, live entertainment & a restaurant.
detail_description: Nestled in the enchanting city of Puerto Iguazu, City Center Iguazú stands out as a vibrant entertainment hub that perfectly complements the region's natural allure. This lively destination offers an array of leisure activities, including a casino filled with table games and slot machines where you can try your luck using Argentine pesos, Brazilian reais, or US dollars. Beyond gaming, visitors can enjoy live entertainment and indulge in delicious meals at its on-site restaurant.
name: City Center Iguazú
address: RN12 km 1640, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: The Triple Frontier is a tri-border area along the junction of Argentina, Brazil and Paraguay, where the Iguazú and Paraná rivers converge. Near the confluence are the cities of Puerto Iguazú, Foz do Iguaçu and Ciudad del Este. This area is near Iguazú Falls and the Itaipu hydroelectric plant. Wikipedia.
detail_description: Triple Frontier is a fascinating tri-border area where Argentina, Brazil, and Paraguay meet at the convergence of the Iguazú and Paraná rivers. This region is home to the cities of Puerto Iguazú, Foz do Iguaçu, and Ciudad del Este, offering visitors the unique opportunity to explore three countries in a short span of time.
name: Triple Frontier
address: 100225 Presidente Franco, Paraguay

excerpt: Polar-themed ice bar by Dreamland Wax Museum serving drinks in sub-zero temperatures.
detail_description: Nestled within the vibrant Dreamland Complex, Dreams Ice Bar is a one-of-a-kind attraction that transports visitors into a frosty wonderland. This polar-themed ice bar features walls, furniture, and stunning sculptures all crafted from ice, creating an enchanting atmosphere perfect for those seeking respite from the heat of Foz do Iguacu. With temperatures consistently hovering around -11°C (12°F), guests can enjoy exotic drinks served in glasses made of ice while lounging on solid blocks of frozen artistry.
name: Dreams Ice Bar
address: Av. das Cataratas, 8100 - Sala 4 - Foz do Iguaçu, PR, 85853-000, Brazil

detail_description: Nestled amidst the lush greenery of Puerto Iguazú, Icebar Iguazú offers a unique and exhilarating experience that stands out in this tropical paradise. With temperatures plunging to a frosty -10 degrees Celsius, this enchanting ice bar features stunning sculptures, furniture, and walls crafted entirely from ice by talented international artists. Guests are provided with cozy jackets and gloves upon entry to ensure comfort while they indulge in an array of delicious drinks served for 30 minutes at the open bar.
name: Icebar Iguazú
address: Ruta 12 km 4,5, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Wax museum at Foz do Iguaçu Park Show featuring life-sized sculptures of international celebrities.
detail_description: Dreams Park Show in Foz do Iguaçu features a wax museum with life-sized sculptures of international celebrities. It's a great place for families and friends, especially those with small kids, as it offers unique attractions. Visitors can expect an amazing outing that the kids will absolutely love. However, some have mentioned that the actual cost is higher than what is advertised on the website and there are concerns about pricing for photos at the park.
name: Dreams Park Show
address: Av. das Cataratas, 8100 - Vila Yolanda, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-000, Brazil

detail_description: Reserva Selva Iryapú is a serene and natural area surrounded by lush greenery, offering a peaceful atmosphere for visitors. It is located near the breathtaking Iguazu National Park, providing easy access to explore the stunning Iguazu Falls. The jungle landscape gives it an unmatched natural character and provides an environment where Guarani communities and jungle hotels coexist. Visitors can engage in physical activities while immersing themselves in the incredible surroundings.
name: Reserva Selva Iryapú.
address: N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Self-serve BBQ meat, pasta, salads & desserts in a lively space with nightly Latin music & dancing.
detail_description: Experience a vibrant night out at Rafain Churrascaria Show in Foz do Iguacu, where you can immerse yourself in Latin American culture and folklore. This popular tourist attraction offers a Dinner with Latin American Show featuring performances from eight countries, including Paraguay, Bolivia, Colombia, Chile, Uruguay, Mexico, Argentina and Brazil.
name: Rafain Churrascaria Show
address: Av. das Cataratas, 1749 - Vila Yolanda, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-000, Brazil

detail_description: Hostel Damaris offers a cozy and welcoming atmosphere, making it a great place to connect with fellow travelers. The friendly hosts provide excellent value for money and keep the rooms and facilities clean. While there may be occasional issues like water outages, the overall experience is positive. The hostel's location is convenient, within walking distance of the city center, and they offer helpful services such as arranging taxis for sightseeing trips.
name: Hostel Damaris
address: Peteribi 225, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Imaginative hostel set in colorful shipping containers, offering an outdoor plunge pool & a bar.
detail_description: Tetris Container Hostel is an innovative and eco-friendly accommodation made entirely from recycled shipping containers, making it the largest of its kind globally. Situated in Foz do Iguacu, this hostel offers a one-of-a-kind experience with its colorful container rooms and various amenities. Guests can take advantage of the outdoor plunge pool, fully stocked bar, pool table, book exchange, and board games.
name: Tetris Container
address: Av. das Cataratas, 639 - Vila Yolanda, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-000, Brazil

excerpt: Expansive water park with thermal baths, a beach & wave pool, plus water slides & a zip line.
detail_description: Blue Park Foz is a sprawling water park that offers a range of attractions for visitors. The park features thermal baths, a beach with white sand, and a wave pool, as well as water slides and a zip line. Additionally, there are large swimming pools, waterslides, an artificial river for tubing, sports fishing and kayaking lakes, and numerous fast-food options.
name: Blue Park Foz
address: R. Carlos Hugo Urnau, 756 - Lot. Dona Amanda, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-734, Brazil

name: Kattamaram II
address: Extração de Areia, Av. Gen. Meira, 5890 - Porto Meira, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-110, Brazil

excerpt: Polished retreat featuring a buffet restaurant & a spa, plus an outdoor pool & jungle views.
detail_description: Nestled in the lush greenery of Puerto Iguazu, Falls Iguazu Hotel & Spa offers a serene escape for travelers seeking relaxation and adventure. This polished retreat features an inviting buffet restaurant and a rejuvenating spa, perfect for unwinding after exploring the nearby natural wonders. Guests can take advantage of not one but three outdoor pools while soaking in stunning jungle views that invite wildlife sightings. Each spacious room boasts over 30 square meters of comfort, complete with jacuzzi tubs and minibars to enhance your stay.
name: Falls Iguazu Hotel & Spa
address: Batalla Mbororé s/n, Reserva Selva Iryapú, Lote 05,, N3370 Puerto Iguazu, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Plazoleta Nuestra Señora de Iguazú is a charming square located in the heart of the city. It is known for its beautiful landscaping, including colorful flowers and lush greenery. The square offers a peaceful atmosphere, making it a perfect spot to relax and take in the surroundings. Visitors can also find various cafes and shops nearby, adding to the vibrant energy of the area.
name: Plazoleta Nuestra Señora de Iguazú
address: N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Park with monuments marking the location where the borders of Brazil, Argentina & Paraguay meet.
detail_description: Las Tres Fronteras is a park featuring monuments that mark the meeting point of Brazil, Argentina, and Paraguay. It's a great spot to watch the sunset with beautiful views of Brazil and Paraguay. The park offers walkways with benches for strolling or enjoying conversations while taking in the sunset. Visitors can also find street musicians, souvenir shops, and even consider having a picnic by the river.
name: Las Tres Fronteras
address: N3370AWF, Av. Tres Fronteras 515, N3370AWF Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Iguassu Secret Falls is a hidden gem nestled in the Foz do Iguacu region, offering an enchanting escape into pristine nature. Accessible only through ecological trails, this private reserve ensures that visitors can immerse themselves in the tranquility of untouched landscapes. Here, you can discover stunning waterfalls and natural pools surrounded by lush rainforests, providing a serene retreat from bustling tourist spots.
name: Iguassu Secret Falls
address: R. Manêncio Martins, 21 - Vila Yolanda, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-130, Brazil

name: Iguazu Falls Tours
address: Av. República Argentina 12, N3370ARN Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Parque Natural Municipal Luis Honorio Rolón is a serene and harmonious natural park located near the city center. It boasts a diverse range of native flora, making it an ideal place to spend some leisurely time. Visitors can enjoy the tranquility and beauty of the park while exploring its natural wonders. Additionally, excursions to nearby attractions such as Parque de las Aves are available, providing a comprehensive tour experience that includes transfers and knowledgeable guides for an immersive adventure lasting approximately 4 hours.
name: Parque Natural Municipal Luis Honorio Rolón
address: N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: La Vinoteca de Don Jorge is a wine lover's paradise, boasting an extensive collection of over 3,000 labels at excellent prices. Whether you're looking to indulge in a tasting experience or take home some bottles of liquid gold, this is the place to be. With a focus on Argentine wines, it's recommended to jot down the prices of your favorite selections before your visit or compare them online while browsing in-store. Additionally, cash payments are rewarded with a 15% discount.
name: La Vinoteca de Don Jorge
address: Av. República Argentina 188, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

name: Aguaray Eco Esportes
address: Alameda Caete - Chácara - Remanso Grande, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, Brazil

excerpt: Classic Middle Eastern specialties like kibbeh meatballs & kofta served in a buzzing dining room.
detail_description: Le Mir Comida Arabe is a Lebanese restaurant located in Foz do Iguacu, Brazil, offering classic Middle Eastern specialties such as kibbeh meatballs and kofta. The restaurant aims to introduce Brazilian diners to the authentic flavors and spices of traditional Lebanese and Arab cuisine. Despite a language barrier, the attentive waitstaff are dedicated to helping guests understand the menu. While there are limited options for vegans, the food is described as great.
name: Le Mir Comida Arabe
address: R. Jorge Sanwais, 1146 - Centro, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85851-040, Brazil

detail_description: Culturas Park Iguazu is a great place to spend a day with the family. It offers various entertainment options such as a park with dinosaurs and Transformers, souvenir and gem shops, and a water park at the back. Visitors can enjoy the pool and water park, as well as a light show about the beginning of the Earth and precious stone discoveries. It's recommended to arrive early to secure amenities like umbrellas for shade. The entry fee includes consumption charges which are settled upon leaving.
name: Culturas Park Iguazu
address: Av. los Inmigrantes, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Biocentro Iguazú offers a serene experience that perfectly reflects the surrounding rainforest's biodiversity. The tranquil ambiance is filled with the melodic tunes of birds, contrasting with the powerful roar of the falls. Visitors can explore lush greenery and encounter diverse wildlife, including vibrant butterflies, exquisite orchids, and inquisitive toucans. The butterfly garden is a major highlight, captivating visitors with its stunning variety.
name: Biocentro Iguazú
address: RN12 1, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Dreamland Museu de Cera is a must-visit attraction in Foz do Iguacu, Brazil. This wax museum, part of the Foz do Iguacu Park Show, features numerous lifelike statues of international personalities. Opened in 2014, it offers a unique experience that may make you question your location. The museum is located within Dreams Park and showcases wax figures resembling famous individuals and characters from movies.
name: Dreamland - Museu de Cera
address: Av. das Cataratas - Vila Yolanda, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85853-832, Brazil

detail_description: Madero Tango Iguazu is not just a restaurant, but one of the most traditional show venues in Argentina, known for its exceptional Tango Show. To provide tourists with a deeper immersion into Argentine culture, they now offer a Dinner Show option featuring a 6-course tasting menu. The performers' presence from the moment the curtain rises is breathtaking, with passionate support from a 5-piece folk band and incredible dancers on stage.
name: Madero Tango Iguazu
address: RN12 2, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

name: seguro carta verde
address: Av. Mercosul, 101 - Jardim Veraneio, Foz do Iguaçu - PR, 85855-650, Brazil

name: Av. Mercosul - Foz do Iguaçu
address: PR, 85855-650, Brazil

detail_description: Remises Wanda is a highly recommended transportation service known for its excellent customer service and friendly staff. Carlos and his colleagues are praised for their helpfulness, punctuality, and willingness to go the extra mile to ensure a pleasant travel experience. Customers appreciate the comfortable vehicles, reasonable prices, and the team's availability to address any concerns or provide assistance throughout the journey. Whether it's transfers to the airport or accommodating unexpected changes in plans, Remises Wanda is commended for its flexibility and reliability.
name: Remises Wanda
address: 90 y, Pombero, Fray Luis Beltrán, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

name: Municipal Luis H. Rolón Natural Park
address: Av. San Martín 300, N3370AVP Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: If you're looking to immerse yourself in the rich indigenous culture of the region, a visit to Comunidad Guaraní Yryapu is a must. Nestled within a sprawling 300-hectare area, this community thrives on self-sustainability and offers an authentic glimpse into their way of life. Engage with locals who are eager to share their traditions and craftsmanship through handmade souvenirs.
name: Comunidad guaraní yryapu
address: Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Funeraria Eldorado is a compassionate establishment dedicated to providing support during life's most challenging moments. With a focus on honoring the memories of loved ones, this funeral home offers a range of services designed to meet the diverse needs of families. From personalized memorials to professional guidance, Funeraria Eldorado ensures that every detail is handled with care and respect. Their commitment to creating meaningful tributes reflects their understanding of the importance of celebrating life while navigating grief.
name: Funeraria Eldorado
address: Av. Misiones 42 30, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Bamboo Agt is a captivating destination nestled within a lush jungle teeming with vibrant bamboo, diverse trees, and colorful flowers. This enchanting area is alive with wildlife, particularly an array of birds like toucans and hummingbirds that flit through the canopy. The striking sienna red dirt creates a stunning contrast against the grassy riverbanks, enhancing the natural beauty of the landscape.
name: Bamboo agt

excerpt: Giant, U-shaped cascade in Iguaçu National Park accessible by hiking trail & a suspended walkway.
detail_description: Devil's Throat is a giant, U-shaped cascade located in Iguaçu National Park. Visitors can reach it by walking along a 1.1km suspended walkway that crosses the tranquil Rio Iguazu. The lookout platform offers a breathtaking view of this powerful and concentrated torrent of water, creating a deafening cascade that plunges into an invisible destination. The mist from the falls forms a smoke-like plume visible several kilometers away, adding to the majestic and awe-inspiring experience.
name: Devil's Throat
address: Misiones Province, Argentina

excerpt: Expansive park with train rides to massive Iguazú Falls & a visitor center with an exhibition.
detail_description: Iguazú National Park is a vast expanse that attracts over 1.5 million visitors annually. The park offers train rides to the impressive Iguazú Falls and features a visitor center with an exhibition. On the Argentine side of the falls, there are various walking trails, including the Sendero Verde path where you might spot capuchin monkeys. Additionally, there are accommodations like Awasi lodge and Yucuma Lodge that prioritize conservation efforts and support local communities.
name: Iguazú National Park
address: Ruta 101 Km 142, N3370 Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

excerpt: Massive, picturesque waterfalls surrounded by trails, with wildlife & a train through the jungle.
detail_description: Iguazu Falls is a stunning natural wonder that captivates visitors with its immense beauty and power. Nestled within the lush landscapes of Iguazu National Park, this breathtaking site offers not only spectacular views of cascading waterfalls but also an opportunity to explore winding trails teeming with diverse wildlife, including jaguars and vibrant birds. The park's well-maintained facilities make it family-friendly, ensuring everyone can enjoy the experience.
name: Iguazu Falls
address: Misiones, Argentina

name: Yryapu turismo guaraní
address: N 3370, Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: Located in the Argentine city, Orquideario del Indio Solitario is a must-visit for flower enthusiasts, particularly orchid lovers. The orchid garden offers a wide variety of these beautiful flowers, with some being reasonably priced while others are more rare and expensive. Visitors can also enjoy the sight of hummingbirds in the garden. The knowledgeable staff provides valuable tips and information about caring for orchids.
name: Orquideario del Indio Solitario
address: Jangadero 719, N3370EAO Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

name: Paseos de Luna Llena en las Cataratas del Iguazú
address: Parque Nacional Iguazú, Cataratas del Iguazú, N3370AXJ Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina

detail_description: The Catedral Virgen del Carmen in Puerto Iguazu stands prominently in front of the town square, boasting a unique architectural style that sets it apart from other cathedrals. Unlike grandiose structures, this church exudes a peaceful and tranquil ambiance despite its small size. Well-maintained and immaculate, it manages to instill spiritual serenity in both visitors and parishioners alike.
name: Catedral Virgen del Carmen
address: Av. Victoria Aguirre N° 180, C.P 3370, Puerto Iguazú, Misiones, Argentina
